name: SPOOKY HALLOWEEN NIGHT 2023
description:
This fall, Spooky Halloween is coming to Dhaka’s Tokyo Square Convention Center with a sinister transformation, turning the courtside into a scream park filled with Halloween attractions that offer unforgettable thrills and unspeakable horror.

Immerse yourself in the nightmare of Haunt, a Halloween event where the streets are filled with terror, including hundreds of monsters, terrifying scary games, fortune-telling booth, fancy dress performance, face art booth, magic show, DJ & so much more.

If you’re looking for things to do – or places to scream – this fall in the Dhaka area, don’t miss Dhaka’s largest Halloween event.

name: MAZECON  2023
description:
After five long years, Mazecon is going to make its return this year!

Mazecon is the flagship event of Mazecity – The First Anime Community of Bangladesh. There have been 4 successful iterations of the first-ever Anime Convention in Bangladesh so far and this year, Mazecity is returning with its 5th, Mazecon 2023.

Get ready to be a part of many exciting events such as cosplay competitions, band performances, gaming tournaments, raffle draws, and many more interactive activities for all Anime and Pop-Culture enthusiasts alike.

name: AnimeCon Dhaka 2023
description:
Welcome to AnimeCon Dhaka presents Yukii Matsuri – 金 2023, the most premium anime and pop-culture event in Bangladesh!

AnimeCon Dhaka presents Yukii Matsuri – 金 2023 will be held at Tokyo Square Convention Center on the 2nd December 2023. We are very excited to have you there.

See you at AnimeCon Dhaka presents Yukii Matsuri – 金 2023

name: LET'S VIBE WITH DARSHAN RAVAL #SPREADLOVE
description: Mark your calendars for the 14th of September! Twenty2 events bring you the one & only Darshan Raval and Tanveer Evan on the same stage to exude a musical aura. Get your tickets now.

name: AE BANGLADESH PRESENTS: POP UP FEST 2023
description: October 28, 2023, 11 am at Dhanmondi Foodplex. Join us for a day filled with fun activities and attractions including BOARD GAME CORNER, LIVE ART COMPETITION, ANIME QUIZ, BEYBLADE BATTLES, PAPER CRAFT CORNER, MANGA READING CORNER, AMV SCREENING, COSPLAY, MERCHANDISE STALLS, ANIME SCREENING, SHOKUGEKI (Food battle), and FOOD STALLS.

name: D1 Cup And Concert Season 2
description: The second season of the biggest e-Sports event in Bangladesh, with the biggest prize pool. The tournament encompasses three competitive games, namely Valorant, Mobile Legends: Bang Bang (MLBB), and Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS: GO). The preliminary rounds will take place online over the course of a month, leading up to the finals at ICCB Hall 2 on September 2, 2023.

name: AnimeCon Chattogram 2023
description:
Hello everyone!
The wait is over, and the most premium anime convention in Bangladesh – AnimeCon Chattogram is finally back! We are excited to present to you AnimeCon Chattogram 2023 – Sakura!

name: BTS ARMY FESTA 2024
description: Welcoming all BTS fans to a day of celebration at the BTS ARMY FESTA.
attractions: Cake cutting and BTS ARMY FESTA celebration
BTS fan quiz & fun games with prizes
